channel.title: Dragon Bow
channel.description:
My version of a dragon bow:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/dh32hz.png[/img]
Tell me if it descent enough to add on to my private server.. because i don't want no complants about "that bow is ugly." from someone that plays my server.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mtw0o2.jpg[/img]
Thanks.

item.title: Dragon Bow
item.dc:creator: @Javac_Batch Javac Batch
item.description:
@Javac_Batch wrote:

No it doesn’t? Ehm, are you high :P?

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Bow
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

It looks like a crab. Refer to 1st picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Bow
item.dc:creator: @Javac_Batch Javac Batch
item.description:
@Javac_Batch wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:16, topic:256913”][quote author=Javac Batch link=topic=339269.msg2637731#msg2637731 date=1232646601]

i like the general idea but the wings dont work with it. i mean they do but not with their current structure. it seems like a short bow cuzza how short the string is. maybe make it like:

  Wing 1                   Wing 2:
 __________         __________

/ / / /=====\ \ \ \

(itll extend till the end of the bow, and make the 2 outermost edges longest and a string connectin them)

Real bows shoot farther with shorter strings. Looks okay, although I don’t see the string.
[/quote]

theirs a diff between a short string and an overly short string. this models is too short(imo).[/quote]
No it’s not. I made a bow even shorter than this once and the gfx looked great.

Read full topic

wings = smaller and it will be good.

but yours sucks… mines totally owns yours x2 plus yours in a longbow mines is a shortbow … +++ they look totally dif

dummy[/quote]
